## TextElement.textMayOverlap property

If `true`<!-- -->, `TextElement` is allowed to overlap other labels or icons of lower priority.

 `false`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get textMayOverlap(): boolean;

set textMayOverlap(mayOverlap: boolean);
```
